attributes.action: allow full access to personal allowance at the higher rate for all women of pension age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Women are discriminated against for a further 5 years after retirement, in that they do not get the increased personal allowance at 60 when they retire but at 65 the age that men retire.
Gender equality is allowed for prescriptions and other charges but does not translate to pensions.
This means that should you have saved for your pension, you will still pay tax as if you were working even though your income has reduced, but your costs have stayed the same or increased with inflation.
It is time that equality applied to all benefits including pensions.
